name: Soft Idli
description: Steamed South Indian rice cakes, light and fluffy.
instructions: Soak rice and urad dal separately for 4-6 hours.
Grind into a smooth batter and ferment overnight.
Pour into idli molds and steam for 10-12 minutes.

name: South Indian Filter Coffee
description: Aromatic and strong South Indian filter coffee.
instructions: Boil water and add to filter coffee maker.
Allow the decoction to brew slowly.
Mix with hot milk and serve with sugar.

name: White Sauce Pasta
description: Creamy and cheesy white sauce pasta.
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente and set aside.
Prepare white sauce with butter, flour, and milk.
Mix pasta with sauce and season with salt & pepper.

name: Blue Lagoon Mocktail
instructions: Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Add Blue Curacao and lemon juice.
Top with Sprite and stir gently.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato masala.
instructions: Soak and grind rice and urad dal to make batter.
Prepare potato masala with onions and spices.
Spread batter on a hot pan, add masala, and cook until crispy.

name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Cook basmati rice with whole spices.
Layer rice and chicken, then cook on low heat.

name: Mango Lassi
description: Sweet and creamy mango-flavored yogurt drink.
instructions: Blend mango, yogurt, sugar, and cardamom until smooth.
Chill before serving.
